companyName: The Kulick Law Firm, LLC - Exeter, PA

moreBlocks.websites: http://thekulicklawfirm.com/ http://thekulicklawfirm.com/blog/

description:
From our location in Exeter, our team at The Kulick Law Firm, LLC, aggressively defends people who have been charged with misdemeanors and felony offenses throughout northeastern Pennsylvania. We are qualified to handle cases involving arson, driving under the influence, drug offenses, theft, forgery, embezzlement, fraud and other white collar crimes. We also represent juveniles, as well as people who have been charged with probation violations.

 

No matter what each case involves, our law firm investigates the circumstances thoroughly to identify any mistakes or misconduct that may undermine the charges against our clients. Our staff carefully reviews each option for minimizing the long-term consequences that people face. We also keep our clients aware of their choices at all times, starting with the complimentary first consultation that we provide. To make our services more easily accessible, we take credit card payments.

 

At The Kulick Law Firm, LLC, we help clients navigate a number of civil law issues. We offer representation during landlord-tenant disputes and guide personal injury victims through the claim process. Our staff assists parents in seeking agreeable resolutions to disputes over child custody, child support and other contentious aspects of divorce. We also aid people in drafting or reviewing advanced medical directives, wills, powers of attorney and any other documents needed to ensure that their final wishes are honored.
